EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Americas_GDT_User-Growth_Something_Special_for_You_email.Subject Line Tes
EmailTemplate.subject: Act Now - $100 Offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As the world evolves in reaction to recent events, so do we as buyers and sellers in the used serviceable aero market. Buying and selling will become more digital and online, migrating away from traditional face to face meetings, phone calls, and email RFQs.
A little something just for you. Use promo code FIRSTORDER to get *$100 off your first online order.
Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect™ Trade first. It takes a second to search and sixty seconds to checkout.
Our marketplace has been featured on Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from "small startup" to "major disruptor". Buy your parts online and you will never want to do it "the old way" ever again. JOIN GODIRECT TRADE FOR FREE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login/]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
*Promotion details: $100 discount taken off at checkout, must be on a minimum order purchase of $500 from Honeywell Aerospace Trading’s storefront.
